function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low quality score of some studies, including cross-sectional studies","category":"Reliability and Quality of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor compliance, concern over data misuse","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of r2 values for fixed-lag lengths","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrestricted access to disease data for public use may pose a risk of misinterpretation or misrepresentation, technology.","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of semantic understanding in plain texts may result in the extraction of incorrect fact triples, leading to misinformation in the knowledge graph.","category":"Potential Misinformation and False Data","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of 7 participants who failed the attention check may lead to
